select course_id, course_name, weekday, `time`, teacher_name, course_room from tb_course inner join tb_teacher tt on tb_course.teacher_id = tt.teacher_id where offer_state = '1'
and course_name like concat('%',#{courseName},'%')
and `time` = #{courseTime}
and teacher_name like concat('%',#{teacherName},'%')
